GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v6.0.17
GSD.description:
mm, compaction: fix fast_isolate_around() to stay within boundaries

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 0fc9ba59eb4c8afcc9a0761586ce45fd827abd4f, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 6e2b7044c199229a3d20cefbd3184968238c4184. For more details please see the references link.
